Aug. 5, 1979 D NSW State Championships (Junior A Grade)
NSW State Championships (Junior A Grade) 110 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest NSW State Championships nsw-state-championships-junior-a-grade
Australia
Youth
In Somerset, A Little Suite
The Concourse, Chatswood, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia Just before Toronto were to play, their conductor, Dennis Babbage had a heart attack and was taken to hospital. In his absence, Willoughby conductor, Peter Walmsley conducted Toronto to a win over his own band.
Own Choice Draw 3, 1, 2
Sept. 4, 2014, 2:42 p.m. Oct. 7, 2016, 11:59 p.m.
1 Toronto & District Juniors Peter Walmsley Glastonbury
2 Willoughby City Junior Band Peter Walmsley Themes from Symphony no. 5 [Tchaikovsky, arr. Ball]
3 Yagoona District Juniors Warwick Sands Second Rhapsody on Negro Spirituals
